}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "7016A044302a" and "v1.20" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :The ''[[Freescale]]'' SoC used in this device is P/N P1020NSE2DFB. :It's also marked w/ "533/677 MHZ", "QQLG1112", and "MALAYSIA".
"P/N: 5816A0474000" and "P/N: 5816A0475000" are printed on the stickers on the modules. :"CK77 94V-0" is silkscreened on the wireless modules.
The AP is essentially identical to the [[Aerohive HiveAP 330]] besides the antenna configuration :(330 = integral antennas, 350 = external antennas connected via RP-SMA).
;Per the FCC manual / QSG... *The default SSID pattern is '''AH-XXXXXX_ac''' ('''XXXXXX''' being the last three octets :of the wireless interface MAC address [lower case letters]). :The default PSK is specified as '''aerohive'''. *The default login (telnet [<small>''note that the Telnet connection is protected by the WPA2 security'']</small><!-- LOL! --> / SSH) :credentials appear to be '''admin:aerohive'''. The default IP address ''may'' be ''1.1.1.1''.
Per '''WiGLE''', this device may use 08:EA:44 and/or 40:18:B1 OUIs.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Freescale]]'' P1020 Dual-core ''PowerPC'' (@533MHz) *Memory: 256MB (SDRAM) DDR2 *Storage: 64MB NOR Flash *Network: 2x Gigabit Ethernet ports *WiFi: 2x [[Atheros]] AR9390 (3T3R 802.11abgn) *USB: 1x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 12V, 2A via barrel or 802.3af via eth0
==Links of Interest== :[https://docs.aerohive.com/330000/docs/help/english/6.6r1/hm/full/Content/hw/ap/AP330_AP350.htm Product Documentation]
